page.title: 17Clubs in Waltham St Lawrence
page.content:
There are various clubs and groups in the area for the entertainment of the people who live there.
For the the young there is a{Brownie {Pack}which meets every week in the Neville Hall while for the adults there is a very active local branch of the{Women's Institute}which meets regularly and holds a weekly{produce {sale}in Twyford. The local branch of the{National Housewife's Register} meets once a month for social events and talks by visiting speakers. There is a thriving{Over 60's Club}which meets weekly for social events.
Each year there is a{village show} with{competitions}and{displays}of village activities and produce.
